decoworld.model.world.combat

Interface HealthEffect

  • Deprecated. 
    - Use StatEffect instead

    @Deprecated
public interface HealthEffect
    Represents a generic health modifying effect.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WorldItem getSender()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns the WorldItem that caused this effect (e.g.
      double healthDelta()
      Deprecated. 
      Returns a delta that is applied to an objects health.

    • Method Detail

      • healthDelta

        double healthDelta()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns a delta that is applied to an objects health. For example, health = health + healthDelta() This is a simplistic example and other resistances or bonuses may be applied. The delta can be positive to heal or negative to cause damage.
        Returns:
        delta - the amount of health to add

      • getSender

        WorldItem getSender()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the WorldItem that caused this effect (e.g. an arrow). If a WorldItem did not cause this effect (e.g. you fell off a cliff and died), then return NULL
        Returns:
        sender - the WorldItem that caused this effect.
